title: why no black market brawlers ,butchers bridge or magma chamber??
body: Why is there no black market brawlers in the weekly rotation?? i mean i dont really like the mode but i luv the gangplank voice over and the music same with butchers bridge the turrets look amazing please bring back the map texture. oh and should they release magma chamber i thinks thats a great idea{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: Magma chamber was a piece of shit that got deleted in it's alpha stage, it was buggy and crashed graphics drivers.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=NjEElsTI,discussion-id=eEXKb6h8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-05T14:17:25.183+0000)
>
> Magma chamber was a piece of shit that got deleted in it's alpha stage, it was buggy and crashed graphics drivers.

then modify it until its good.
Nah, no point making an entirely new map for a single game mode that's only temporary when Howling Abyss does the job fine.
rly?? oh  i never knew that{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Surprisingly no one who wants magma chamber knows that, because all they want to know is that it's coming.
